availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: R. W. Thomas (Barren County, KY, farmer and prov govt)

body.p: Barren County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Analisa Thomas. Father of R. W. Thomas, John Thomas, Mary E. Thomas, Thomas S. Thomas, R. R. Thomas, and H. K. Thomas. Owned twenty enslaved persons in Barren County in 1860. Farmer in Barren County in 1860. Member of the convention of the provisional government held at Russellville in November 1861.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Barren County, p. 975.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Barren County, p. 64B.
KYR-0004-033-0001.
